description: This source file defines a health check endpoint for a web service using Flask framework. It creates a Flask Blueprint with a single route '/' that responds with a 'Healthy' status message, intended for service health verification.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask MethodView class implementing a health check endpoint

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check endpoint, returning a 'Healthy' message

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Health Check", "health", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route")$/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Health Check", "health", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route")
